verses.verse: Then Ya`akov <WH3290> went on <WH5375> <WH8799> his journey <WH7272>, and came <WH3212> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> of the people <WH1121> of the east <WH6924>.

And he looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and behold a well <WH875> in the field <WH7704>, and, lo, there were three <WH7969> flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629> lying <WH7257> <WH8802> by it; for out of that well <WH875> they watered <WH8248> <WH8686> the flocks <WH5739>: and a great <WH1419> stone <WH68> was upon the well's <WH875> mouth <WH6310>.

And thither were all the flocks <WH5739> gathered <WH622> <WH8738>: and they rolled <WH1556> <WH8804> the stone <WH68> from the well's <WH875> mouth <WH6310>, and watered <WH8248> <WH8689> the sheep <WH6629>, and put <WH7725> the stone <WH68> again <WH7725> <WH8689> upon the well's <WH875> mouth <WH6310> in his place <WH4725>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, My brethren <WH251>, whence <WH370> be ye? And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Of Haran <WH2771> are we.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Know <WH3045> <WH8804> ye Laban <WH3837> the son <WH1121> of Nahor <WH5152>? And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, We know <WH3045> <WH8804> him.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Is he well <WH7965>? And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, He is well <WH7965>: and, behold, Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> cometh <WH935> <WH8802> with the sheep <WH6629>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Lo <WH2005>, it is yet high <WH1419> day <WH3117>, neither is it time <WH6256> that the cattle <WH4735> should be gathered together <WH622> <WH8736>: water <WH8248> <WH8685> ye the sheep <WH6629>, and go <WH3212> <WH8798> and feed <WH7462> <WH8798> them.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, We cannot <WH3201> <WH8799>, until all the flocks <WH5739> be gathered together <WH622> <WH8735>, and till they roll <WH1556> <WH8804> the stone <WH68> from the well's <WH875> mouth <WH6310>; then we water <WH8248> <WH8689> the sheep <WH6629>.
And while he yet <WH5750> spake <WH1696> <WH8764> with them, Rachel <WH7354> came <WH935> <WH8804> with her father's <WH1> sheep <WH6629>: for she kept them <WH7462> <WH8802>.

And it came to pass, when Ya`akov <WH3290> saw <WH7200> <WH8804> Rachel <WH7354> the daughter <WH1323> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's <WH517> brother <WH251>, and the sheep <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's <WH517> brother <WH251>, that Ya`akov <WH3290> went near <WH5066> <WH8799>, and rolled <WH1556> <WH8686> the stone <WH68> from the well's <WH875> mouth <WH6310>, and watered <WH8248> <WH8686> the flock <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's <WH517> brother <WH251>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> kissed <WH5401> <WH8799> Rachel <WH7354>, and lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his voice <WH6963>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> told <WH5046> <WH8686> Rachel <WH7354> that he was her father's <WH1> brother <WH251>, and that he was Rebekah's <WH7259> son <WH1121>: and she ran <WH7323> <WH8799> and told <WH5046> <WH8686> her father <WH1>.

And it came to pass, when Laban <WH3837> heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the tidings <WH8088> of Ya`akov <WH3290> his sister's <WH269> son <WH1121>, that he ran <WH7323> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> him, and embraced <WH2263> <WH8762> him, and kissed <WH5401> <WH8762> him, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> him to his house <WH1004>. And he told <WH5608> <WH8762> Laban <WH3837> all these things <WH1697>.
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> <WH8799> to him, Surely <WH389> thou art my bone <WH6106> and my flesh <WH1320>. And he abode <WH3427> <WH8799> with him the space <WH3117> of a month <WH2320>.

And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, Because thou art my brother <WH251>, shouldest thou therefore serve <WH5647> <WH8804> me for nought <WH2600>? tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, what shall thy wages <WH4909> be ?
And Laban <WH3837> had two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323>: the name <WH8034> of the elder <WH1419> was Leah <WH3812>, and the name <WH8034> of the younger <WH6996> was Rachel <WH7354>.
Leah <WH3812> was tender <WH7390> eyed <WH5869>; but Rachel <WH7354> was beautiful <WH3303> <WH8389> and well <WH3303> favoured <WH4758>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> loved <WH157> <WH8799> Rachel <WH7354>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will serve <WH5647> <WH8799> thee seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel <WH7354> thy younger <WH6996> daughter <WH1323>.

And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is better <WH2896> that I give <WH5414> <WH8800> her to thee, than that I should give <WH5414> <WH8800> her to another <WH312> man <WH376>: abide <WH3427> <WH8798> with me.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> served <WH5647> <WH8799> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel <WH7354>; and they seemed <WH5869> unto him but a few <WH259> days <WH3117>, for the love he had <WH160> to her.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Laban <WH3837>, Give <WH3051> <WH8798> me my wife <WH802>, for my days <WH3117> are fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8804>, that I may go in <WH935> <WH8799> unto her.
And Laban <WH3837> gathered together <WH622> <WH8799> all the men <WH582> of the place <WH4725>, and made <WH6213> <WH8799> a feast <WH4960>.
And it came to pass in the evening <WH6153>, that he took <WH3947> <WH8799> Leah <WH3812> his daughter <WH1323>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> her to him; and he went in <WH935> <WH8799> unto her.
And Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto his daughter <WH1323> Leah <WH3812> Zilpah <WH2153> his maid <WH8198> for an handmaid <WH8198>.

And it came to pass, that in the morning <WH1242>, behold, it was Leah <WH3812>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> to Laban <WH3837>, What is this thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto me? did not I serve <WH5647> <WH8804> with thee for Rachel <WH7354>? wherefore then hast thou beguiled <WH7411> <WH8765> me?
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> <WH8799>, It must not be so done <WH6213> <WH8735> in our country <WH4725>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> the younger <WH6810> before <WH6440> the firstborn <WH1067>.

Fulfil <WH4390> <WH8761> her <WH2063> week <WH7620>, and we will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee this also for the service <WH5656> which thou shalt serve <WH5647> <WH8799> with me yet seven <WH7651> other <WH312> years <WH8141>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so, and fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8762> her week <WH7620>: and he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802> also.
And Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> to Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> Bilhah <WH1090> his handmaid <WH8198> to be her maid <WH8198>.

And he went in <WH935> <WH8799> also unto Rachel <WH7354>, and he loved <WH157> <WH8799> also Rachel <WH7354> more than Leah <WH3812>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> with him yet seven <WH7651> other <WH312> years <WH8141>.
And when the YY <WH3068> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that Leah <WH3812> was hated <WH8130> <WH8803>, he opened <WH6605> <WH8799> her womb <WH7358>: but Rachel <WH7354> was barren <WH6135>.

And Leah <WH3812> conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>, and she called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Re'uven <WH7205>: for <WH3588> she said <WH559> <WH8804>, Surely <WH3588> the YY <WH3068> hath looked <WH7200> <WH8804> upon my affliction <WH6040>; now therefore <WH3588> my husband <WH376> will love <WH157> <WH8799> me.

And she conceived <WH2029> <WH8799> again, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Because the YY <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that I was hated <WH8130> <WH8803>, he hath therefore given <WH5414> <WH8799> me this son also: and she called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> SHim`on <WH8095>.

And she conceived again <WH2029> <WH8799>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Now this time <WH6471> will my husband <WH376> be joined <WH3867> <WH8735> unto me, because I have born <WH3205> <WH8804> him three <WH7969> sons <WH1121>: therefore was his name <WH8034> called <WH7121> <WH8804> Levi <WH3878>.

And she conceived <WH2029> <WH8799> again, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>: and she said <WH559> <WH8799>, Now <WH6471> will I praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068>: therefore she called <WH7121> <WH8804> his name <WH8034> Y'hudah <WH3063>; and left <WH5975> <WH8799> bearing <WH3205> <WH8800>.
